citations.narrative:
Two upper rabbit enclosures on the right side of the animal room have rusty and broken wire on the back corners on the
floor. Primary enclosures must be structurally sound and maintained in good repair to protect the rabbits from injury. The
wire floors in these two enclosures must be repaired or replaced to prevent injury to the rabbits. Correct by August 15,
2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.53(a)(1) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
Two upper rabbit enclosures on the right side of the animal room have rusty and broken wire on the back corners on the 
floor. Primary enclosures must be structurally sound and maintained in good repair to protect the rabbits from injury. The 
wire floors in these two enclosures must be repaired or replaced to prevent injury to the rabbits. Correct by August 15, 
2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
